block.p: Dr. Erica Lynne Zimmerman and Dr. David Blumberg, physicians at the University of Pittsburgh, were married last evening. Rabbi Joseph Meszler performed the ceremony at the J. W. Marriott Hotel in Washington.
The bride, 32, is an internist at the student health service. The bridegroom, 37, is an assistant professor of surgery at the medical school and a colorectal surgeon at the medical center.

Dr. Erica Lynne Zimmerman and Dr. David Blumberg, physicians at the University of Pittsburgh, were married last evening. Rabbi Joseph Meszler performed the ceremony at the J. W. Marriott Hotel in Washington.
The bride, 32, is an internist at the student health service. The bridegroom, 37, is an assistant professor of surgery at the medical school and a colorectal surgeon at the medical center.

The bride graduated with honors from the University of Michigan and received her medical degree from George Washington University. She is the daughter of Barbara Zimmerman and Dr. Ernest Zimmerman of Potomac, Md. Her father is an ophthalmologist in Washington. Her mother is a speech therapist.

The bridegroom graduated from Emory University and the State University Health Science Center at Brooklyn. He is the son of Naomi Blumberg of Atlantic Beach, N.Y., and the late Irving Blumberg. His mother owns and manages real estate, as did his father.
